ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] minotaur horn change?
ygData.msgSnippet: I m finding, at lvl 26 that I use my lute an aweful lot now....Lamant, Hymm, Lullaby and CoD. Be nice to have a magic lute;-) ...
ygData.messageBody:
I'm finding, at lvl 26 that I use my lute an aweful
lot now....Lamant, Hymm, Lullaby and CoD.

Be nice to have a magic lute;-)

--- Sylly Songsynger <jgs@...> wrote:
> Good question - what gets 15% better?
>
> The only wind based song that I know that shows a
> difference with an
> instrument is Charillion - has someone quantified
> the effect with this song?
>
> 15% more air under water?
> 15% more invisible?
> 15% further away with shadow step? - hmm possible
> 15% better see invis?
> 15% better charms & pixie strikes? Is there a longer
> duration with
> intrument?
> 15% higher levitation? possible i guess
> 15% better bind sight?
>
> And the expansion ones - we don seem to even know
> what they do.
>
> Sylly
